root.name: rect()
root.description: Draws a rectangle to the screen. A rectangle is a four-sided shape with every angle at ninety degrees. By default, the first two parameters set the location of the upper-left corner, the third sets the width, and the fourth sets the height. These parameters may be changed with the rectMode() function.

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: int or float: x-coordinate of the upper-left corner

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: int or float: y-coordinate of the upper-left corner

parameter.label: width
parameter.description: int or float: width of the rectangle

parameter.label: height
parameter.description: int or float: height of the rectangle
